mapper.sql: id, partner_id, sale_order_code, date, order_amount, sku_id, product_url, product_rebate_url, item_name, item_attr, item_count, item_value, item_price, discount_code, real_price_org, exchange_rate, unit, remark, mall_product_code, product_id, site_name, mall_order_no, express_company, express_no, company, mode_type, pay_type, account_id, device_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, order_time, dispatch_time, total_price, rmb_price, status, order_remark, single_price, order_img, promotion_code_list_status
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO external_order_detail ( partner_id, sale_order_code, date, order_amount, sku_id, product_url, product_rebate_url, item_name, item_attr, item_count, item_value, item_price, discount_code, real_price_org, exchange_rate, unit, remark, mall_product_code, product_id, site_name, mall_order_no, express_company, express_no, company, mode_type, pay_type, account_id, device_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, order_time, dispatch_time, total_price, rmb_price, status, order_remark, single_price, order_img, promotion_code_list_status ) VALUES ( #{partnerId}, #{saleOrderCode}, #{date}, #{orderAmount}, #{skuId}, #{productUrl}, #{productRebateUrl}, #{itemName}, #{itemAttr}, #{itemCount}, #{itemValue}, #{itemPrice}, #{discountCode}, #{realPriceOrg}, #{exchangeRate}, #{unit}, #{remark}, #{mallProductCode}, #{productId}, #{siteName}, #{mallOrderNo}, #{expressCompany}, #{expressNo}, #{company}, #{modeType}, #{payType}, #{accountId}, #{deviceId}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{orderTime}, #{dispatchTime}, #{totalPrice}, #{rmbPrice}, #{status}, #{orderRemark}, #{singlePrice}, #{orderImg}, #{promotionCodeListStatus})
mapper.update: update external_order_detail set partner_id=#{partnerId}, sale_order_code=#{saleOrderCode}, date=#{date}, order_amount=#{orderAmount}, sku_id=#{skuId}, product_url=#{productUrl}, product_rebate_url=#{productRebateUrl}, item_name=#{itemName}, item_attr=#{itemAttr}, item_count=#{itemCount}, item_value=#{itemValue}, item_price=#{itemPrice}, discount_code=#{discountCode}, real_price_org=#{realPriceOrg}, exchange_rate=#{exchangeRate}, unit=#{unit}, remark=#{remark}, mall_product_code=#{mallProductCode}, product_id=#{productId}, site_name=#{siteName}, mall_order_no=#{mallOrderNo}, express_company=#{expressCompany}, express_no=#{expressNo}, company=#{company}, mode_type=#{modeType}, pay_type=#{payType}, account_id=#{accountId}, device_id=#{deviceId}, gmt_create=#{gmtCreate}, gmt_modified=#{gmtModified}, order_time=#{orderTime}, dispatch_time=#{dispatchTime}, total_price=#{totalPrice}, rmb_price=#{rmbPrice}, status=#{status}, order_remark=#{orderRemark} where id=#{id}

update external_order_detail
partner_id=#{partnerId},
sale_order_code=#{saleOrderCode},
date=#{date},
order_amount=#{orderAmount},
sku_id=#{skuId},
product_url=#{productUrl},
product_rebate_url=#{productRebateUrl},
item_name=#{itemName},
item_attr=#{itemAttr},
item_count=#{itemCount},
item_value=#{itemValue},
item_price=#{itemPrice},
discount_code=#{discountCode},
real_price_org=#{realPriceOrg},
exchange_rate=#{exchangeRate},
unit=#{unit},
remark=#{remark},
mall_product_code=#{mallProductCode},
product_id=#{productId},
site_name=#{siteName},
mall_order_no=#{mallOrderNo},
express_company=#{expressCompany},
express_no=#{expressNo},
company=#{company},
mode_type=#{modeType},
pay_type=#{payType},
account_id=#{accountId},
device_id=#{deviceId},
gmt_create=#{gmtCreate},
gmt_modified=#{gmtModified},
order_time=#{orderTime},
dispatch_time=#{dispatchTime},
total_price=#{totalPrice},
rmb_price=#{rmbPrice},
status=#{status},
order_remark=#{orderRemark},
single_price=#{singlePrice},
order_img=#{orderImg},
promotion_code_list_status=#{promotionCodeListStatus}
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from external_order_detail where id=#{id}
select * from automan.external_order_detail where and status = #{status}
mapper.update: update automan.external_order_detail set status=#{status},gmt_modified=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select from external_order_detail where `status` in(${status}) order by gmt_modified
